title: FS: Large Lot of Low-Grade T206 w/ HOF's - **FINAL PRICE DROP**

posts.post_title: FS: Large Lot of Low-Grade T206 w/ HOF's - **FINAL PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale or trade. These are all grade cards as the scans will show, and are priced accordingly. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

Cards Pictured (scans of Abbaticchio-Birmingham listed below the others):

REMOVING **SOLD** CARDS FROM THE LIST FOR EASIER VIEWING

Bell - $20
Chappelle - $14
Clymer - $12
Jennings (HOF) - $30
Konetchy - $18
McGinnity (HOF) - $30
Stahl - $10
Street - $11

Marc,

I'll take Young (Portrait) if available.

PM to follow.


Thanks

Hi Marc,

I’ll take the Evers Portrait, PM sent.
Bump for a price drop on the remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
Bump for a final price drop to clear out the last few cards in this group.  Thanks for looking!
